price: Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah wanda Ya halitta sammai da ƙasa, kuma Ya sanya duffai da haske*, sa'an nan kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta, da Ubangijinsu suke karkacewa.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَجَعَلَ ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ وَٱلنُّورَۖ ثُمَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ يَعۡدِلُونَ
footnotes: * Duffai na dare da zãlunci da bin hukunce-hukuncen al'ãdu, haske kuma shĩ ne na taurãri da wuta da shari'u na Littãfi da annabci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wajaʿala al-ẓulumāti wal-nūra thumma alladhīna kafarū birabbihim yaʿdilūna
